name: GetConsoleVarAsInt
tips: Type 'varlist' in the server console to display a list of available console variables and their types.
description: Get the integer value of a console variable.

params_body.name: const varname[]
params_body.description: The name of the integer variable to get the value of.

return_values: The value of the specified console variable. 0 if the specified console variable is not an integer or doesn't exist.
pawn_code:
new serverPort = GetConsoleVarAsInt("port");
printf("Server Port: %i", serverPort);
related_fn:
GetConsoleVarAsString: Retreive a server variable as a string.
 GetConsoleVarAsBool: Retreive a server variable as a boolean.
